title: Mesh Viewer
bodyText: Developed a 3D visualization tool supporting multiple mesh formats (.off, .obj, .txt).
Implemented export functionalities to save meshes in the same formats.
Support for adding textures when the object allows it.
Continuous deployment with Gitlab CI.

title: SlicerGPT
bodyText: 3D Slicer extension that integrates a local AI chatbot.
Provide context-aware help using your scene and official documentation.

title: Medical imaging research - Continued
bodyText: 3D organ reconstruction.

title: Medical imaging research
bodyText: Automatic segmentation of the diaphragm.
Deep learning and usage of Transfer Learning.

title: Mesh Processing
bodyText: Mesh operators (triangle split, edge flip...).
Mesh construction from point clouds.
Implementation of Lawson's algorithm to obtain a "Delaunay" mesh.

title: LEGO ball retrieval robots
bodyText: Made in C++ with EV3Dev library.
Usage of OpenCV for image process.
Merge 4 cameras to obtain a top view.

title: Medical Imaging and Motion Tracking
bodyText: Handling various modalities for medical image acquisition (MRI, X-rays, Ultrasound).
Lung segmentation, converting surface to tetrahedral mesh + creating the transformation matrix T00 <-> T50 with 3D Slicer.
Using a filtered back-projection algorithm on 2D scans to perform 3D reconstruction.

title: Drawing predictions website
bodyText: Discovering of deep learning for image classification.
Using Tensorflow for building architecture and training.
Display of TOP 3 prediction percentage.

title: 3D rendering
bodyText:
Made with C++.
- Usage of ray tracing.
Implementation of the Monte Carlo estimator.

title: 3D Image Synthesis
bodyText: With C++ and the OpenGL 3D API.
Modeled a terrain filled with cubes.
Cube color varies based on height.

title: Deep Learning for Image Generation
bodyText: Implemented in Python using Pytorch.
Reproduces images based on a dance video.

title: Signal process for images
bodyText: Made with Matlab.
Usage of Fourier transform for image process.

title: Turn-Based Fighting Game
bodyText: First project in game design and development.
Coded in C++ using the SDL2 and JsonCpp library.

title: Image Analysis
bodyText: Made with Python, C++, and the OpenCV library.
Part 1: Edge detection using convolution filters.
Part 2: Implemented the Hough Transform algorithm to detect lines and circles.

title: Laplacian Operator on a Mesh
bodyText: Module in C++ for loading a mesh in .off format.
Implementation of the Laplacian operator to calculate curvature.

title: Curves, revolution and implicit surfaces
bodyText: 1rst part : Bézier et Hermite Cubique Spline curves.
2nd part : coding of primitives, operations and transformations. Complex forms modeling.

title: Turn-Based Fighting Game
bodyText: First project in game design and development.
Coded in C++ using the SDL2 and JsonCpp library.

title: Voronoï diagram generation
bodyText: Introduction to Graphs.
Implementing the shortest path algorithm (Dijkstra).
